long_description: Designed for anyone who loves time spent outdoors, the Yakima SkyBox LoPro Roof Box transports your gear to the resort, trailhead or overnight lodge with aerodynamic ease. Low-profile aerodynamic shape cuts down on drag and wind noise while driving. Lid is 50% stiffer than non-SkyBox-series lids, cutting down on vibrations and making it simple to open and close. Dual-sided opening allows easy access from either side of your vehicle; SuperLatch(TM) design can be operated with 1 hand and ensures your lid is locked. Rapid-fire installation is quick and easy-all adjusting and tightening is done from inside the box. Box fits round, square and most factory-rack crossbars (not included); crossbars are required for mounting. SKS lock cores included. Fits crossbar spreads as short as 24 in.
short_description: Designed for anyone who loves time spent outdoors, the Yakima SkyBox LoPro Roof Box transports your gear to the resort, trailhead or overnight lodge with aerodynamic ease.
